Header: Next protest march to regain power; MR
Content: The joint opposition’s five-day protest march that began from Kandy ended yesterday. That was at the Colombo Lipton’s circus Roundabout. The Colombo meeting at the end of the march was held on a platform improvised on a vehicle parked at the Lipton Roundabout. The police also handed over a letter permitting the holding of the meeting concluding the March at Camble Park to former President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the Narahenpita Abhayarama. The protesters arrived along Dalugama, Peliyagoda, Baseline Road, Maligawatta, Panchikawatta and Maradana. The protestors started jeering at the SLFP headquarters while they were passing along T.B. Jayah Mawatha.
